info.description: This document outlines the public API methods available using the XTE and XTCASH Blockchain Cache API which is a replacement for normal XTE and XTCASH daemon RPC calls.
info.title: XTE and XTCASH Blockchain Cache API

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License version 3

get.summary: Returns the current mixable amounts on the network
Returns block statistics for the last 2,880 (1 day) blocks
Returns the current checkpoints IPFS hash

404.description: Could not locate the IPFS hash in DNS

get.summary: Returns node fee information for using this node interface
Returns the blockchain cache current height
Returns current network information regarding the underlying network node(s)
Returns the last base block reward in XTE
Returns the next base block reward in XTE
Returns an 'ok' value indicating that the cache is alive
Returns the current circulating currency supply in XTE
Returns the total number of blocks in the cache
Returns the block information for the block with the specified hash or height

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Either the height of the block or the hash

get.summary: Returns the block header for the block with the specified hash or height

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Either the height of the block or the hash

get.summary: Returns the top block header
Returns details regarding the 30 blocks preceeding the specified block including the specified block
Returns details regarding the 1,000 blocks preceeding the specified block including the specified block
Returns the list of available public nodes with extended information. This is a drop-in replacement for https://github.com/TRRXITTE/XTEnetworkserver/blob/main/traaitt.json

Returns the list of available (have been online at least once) public nodes with extended information. This is a drop-in replacement for https://github.com/TRRXITTE/XTEnetworkserver/blob/main/traaitt.json

parameters.name: max_fee
parameters.description: Do not return nodes with a fee higher than this value

parameters.name: min_version
parameters.description: Do not return nodes that are not at least this version

get.summary: Returns the list of online (as of last check) public nodes with extended information. This is a drop-in replacement for https://github.com/TRRXITTE/XTEnetworkserver/blob/main/traaitt.json

parameters.name: max_fee
parameters.description: Do not return nodes with a fee higher than this value

parameters.name: min_version
parameters.description: Do not return nodes that are not at least this version

get.summary: Returns extended monitoring information of the nodes including the last 20 online statuses
Returns the list of available known mining pools with extended information. This is a drop-in replacement for /
Returns the list of available (have been online at least once) known mining pools with extended information. This is a drop-in replacement for /
Returns the list of online (as of last check) known mining pools with extended information. This is a drop-in replacement for /
Returns extended monitoring information of the known mining pools including the last 20 online statuses
Returns the transactions currently in the mempool
Returns details regarding the transaction with the specified hash
Returns the transcations inputs for the transaction with the specified hash
Returns the transcations outputs for the transaction with the specified hash
Returns the transcations hashes of all transactions with the specified paymentId

post.summary: Returns all the necessary information for a wallet to discover which outputs belong to it

requestBody.description: A syncronization request. Either lastKnownBlockHashes or scanHeight is required.

post.summary: Returns the statuses of the supplied transactions

get.summary: Returns legacy wallet sync data for up to 100 blocks

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height to start returning blocks for

get.summary: Returns legacy wallet sync data

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height to start returning blocks for

parameters.name: blockCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of blocks to return

synced.description: If this value is set, regardless of if we returned any data or not, then we are at the top of the chain and the topBlock property will also be set

height.description: The height of the top block we know about

hash.description: The hash of the top block we know about

startHeight.description: The height to begin returning blocks from

startTimestamp.description: The timestamp to begin returning blocks from (unix style)

skipCoinbaseTransactions.description: A flag that tells the cache to only returns blocks with non-coinbase transactions and for blocks that contain user transactions the coinbase transaction is trimmed off of the block record

post.summary: Returns preflight information for legacy wallet sync operations

height.description: The height of the next block to sync

blockCount.description: How many blocks to sync remaining there are

blockHashes.description: The block hashes up to blockCount that would be returned

synced.description: Whether the request is synced to the top of the chain

topBlock.description: Describes the top block in the chain if synced is true

height.description: The height of the top block

hash.description: The hash of the top block

startHeight.description: The height to begin returning blocks from

startTimestamp.description: The timestamp to begin returning blocks from (unix style)

name.description: The name of the mining pool

url.description: The URL of the pool website

api.description: The base URL of the mining pool API

miningAddress.description: The mining pool stratum server address

mergedMining.description: Whether the mining pool supports merged mining

mergedMiningIsParentChain.description: If merged mining is activated, defines whether it is done as the parent chain

minPayout.description: The minimum payout amount to miners in atomic units

timestamp.description: The last time we checked this mining pool (UTC)

availability.description: Percent of time over the last 20 polling cycles that the pool was online

online.description: Was the mining pool online the last time we checked?

name.description: The name of the mining pool

url.description: The URL of the pool website

api.description: The base URL of the mining pool API

miningAddress.description: The mining pool stratum server address

mergedMining.description: Whether the mining pool supports merged mining

mergedMiningIsParentChain.description: If merged mining is activated, defines whether it is done as the parent chain

minPayout.description: The minimum payout amount to miners in atomic units

timestamp.description: The last time we checked this mining pool (UTC)

availability.description: Percent of time over the last 20 polling cycles that the pool was online

online.description: Was the mining pool online the last time we checked?

height.description: The block height of the mining pool the last time we checked

hashrate.description: The hashrate of the mining pool the last time we checked

miners.description: The number of miners using the mining pool the last time we checked

lastBlock.description: The timestamp of when the mining pool last found a block (UTC)

timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp of the polling check

online.description: The online status of the mining pool at the time of the check

name.example: XTE and XTCASH BlockChain Cache - SSL

port.description: The port number the node operates on

cache.description: Is the node an implementation of a blockchain cache?

availability.description: Percent of time over the last 20 polling cycles that the node was online

online.description: Was the node online the last time we checked?

version.description: The version number reported by the node

timestamp.description: The last time we checked this node (UTC)

name.example: XTE and XTCASH BlockChain Cache - SSL

port.description: The port number the node operates on

cache.description: Is the node an implementation of a blockchain cache?

availability.description: Percent of time over the last 20 polling cycles that the node was online

online.description: Was the node online the last time we checked?

version.description: The version number reported by the node

timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp of the last time this node was checked

height.description: The last reported height of the node

connectionsIn.description: The last reported number of connections in to the node

connectionsOut.description: The last reported number of connections out from the node

difficulty.description: The last reported network difficulty from the node

hashrate.description: The last reported network hashrate from the node

txPoolSize.description: The last reported transaction pool size at the node

timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp of the polling check

online.description: The online status of the node at the time of the check
